notes: irregular verb; used with auxiliary avere
past participle used as adjective or in compound tenses

example_sentence_italian: La scatola è posta sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The box is placed on the table.

example_sentence_italian: I libri sono posti sullo scaffale.
example_sentence_english: The books are placed on the shelf.

example_sentence_italian: Le lettere sono poste sulla scrivania.
example_sentence_english: The letters are placed on the desk.

translation_english: he was putting/she was putting/you (formal) were putting

example_sentence_italian: Hai posto il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You have put the book on the table.

translation_english: he has put/she has put/you (formal) have put
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'

example_sentence_english: They have put an end to the discussion.
